name: Solitaire Alpine
description:
Solitaire or Patience as it is sometimes called revamped and updated with simple clean artwork and the added element of unlocking a series of Alpine photography images. The classic Solitaire gameplay this time as a Solitaire app for your phone or tablet.

Features:

Clean uncluttered graphics
15 stunning alpine photos to unlock
Badges for your best games
Hints and undos
Classic Solitaire game play
In game background options
Playing card options
Tablet support
Different game modes and options
Portrait/ Landscape support
